abstracts.cdata!:
The main part of the project consists of
            the 1977-1978 portions of ENFE's Five-Year Investment
            Plan for 1977-1981. It constitutes a program for the
            continued technical and financial rehabilitation of ENFE
            with particular emphasis on track rehabilitation. In
            addition, the project includes the updating of the 1969
            Bolivia Transport Survey, the implementation of the policy
            recommendations of the updated survey, and technical
            assistance for highway maintenance.
